entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
